code: import{useRef,useEffect}from"react";import{gsap}from"gsap";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Hero=()=>{const title=useRef();const containerHero=useRef();const{t}=useTranslation();useEffect(()=>{gsap.from(title.current,{duration:1.5,rotate:360,repeat:1,yoyoEase:true,ease:"elastic"});gsap.from(containerHero.current,{duration:1.5,rotate:360,repeat:1,yoyoEase:true,ease:"elastic"});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"inicio",className:"containerHero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"titleHero",ref:title,children:"Reymel Rey Mislang."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:containerHero,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"subTitle",children:" Web developer "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"textHero",children:t("text.hero")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#contact",className:"btnHero",children:t("text.hero.btn")})]})]});};export default Hero;
